overview_of_class: This course will provide students with an introduction to the field of performance studies. Performance Studies is an interdisciplinary field that studies a wide variety of phenomenon understood to be "performance" (including traditional performing arts, such as theater or dance, music and sound performance, performance art, activist performance, as well as the presentation of self in everyday life). This course explores fundamental themes and debates that animate the field, introducing students to a range of ways of conceptualizing, approaching, studying, and making performance. In addition to reading the field's key texts and authors, students will be view and attend a range of different types of performance. Alongside scholarly approaches to studying performance, students will experiment with a range of different approaches to making performance.
name: Introduction to Performance Studies
subject: PERF_ST
